description:
With features taken from Salomon's popular trail running shoes, the Cross Hike is built to take on the mountains with speed. Ankle coverage and a high-rebound midsole provide cushion and stability on uneven terrain, and an aggressive sole keeps you tractioned, no matter what Mother Nature throws at you.

  • Seamless synthetic upper with a water-repellent finish
  • Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® bootie lets you tackle wet conditions
  • Protective overlays protect from abrasion and trail debris
  • Removable OrthoLite® footbed cushions feet for long days on the trail
  • Quicklace™ systems with reduced-friction lace eyelets
  • EnergyCell™ midsole combines cushioning and support
  • Non-marking Mud Contagrip® rubber outsole is durable for long-term wear
  • Deep Chevron lugs provide multi-directional grip on soft surfaces
name: Salomon Cross Hike 2 Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
